Job Posting:174769 - Position: W26 Full Stack Developer Intern (16 months) 174769 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/31/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 10/24/2025 09:21 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country IBM Canada Ltd. Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Winter W26 Full Stack Developer Intern (16 months) 174769 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 16 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description Introduction Salary Not Available, 0 Major List At IBM Enablement Developers , we work closely with the sellers to help develop and deliver applications to support their selling.We use cirrus, devops AI, and a lot of memes to provide powerful tools to help selling. We offer a great working environment with the latest tool and the smartest people. You'll have ultimate flexibility in choosing technologies. We guarantee continuous learning at the cutting edge of everything tech. By joining our team, you will establish your eminence in the industry. Your role and responsibilities We're looking for a developer to support our sales mission of creating applications, front and backend with integrated AI to support the sales community. In this role, you'll be using React, Angular, NeuralSeek, Watsonx, Mongo, Db2, and Node, to create applications. Key responsibilities: • Maintain existing applications - Angular, React, Node, DB2, Mongo • Work in front and and backend • Update Databases • Create new innovations in the fast-paced AI environment Job Requirements Required education High School Diploma/GED Preferred education Bachelor's Degree Required technical and professional expertise • Solid understanding of coding principles • Fluency in at least one language Excellent English • Preferred technical and professional experience • Experience or knowledge of one of the full stack languages: Angular, React, Mongo or DB2 • Experience or knowledge of APIs - GET, POST, PUT... OTHER RELEVANT JOB DETAILS Must have the ability to work in Canada without sponsorship. This role will involve working with technology that is covered by Export Regulations sanctions. If you are a Foreign National from any of the following US sanctioned countries (Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Syria, and the Crimea, Luhansk, Donetsk, Kherson, and Zaporizhia regions of Ukraine) on a work permit, you are not eligible for employment in this position. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://ibmglobal.avature.net/en_US/careers/JobDetail?jobId=64712 Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
